channel.title: RuneImpact - Looking for Client&&Server Programmers
channel.description:
[center][b]Read the all of the god damn post before you reply.[/center]
Yeah, I know I'm not too good with Java.. Infact I totally blow at it. But me, and my friends are making a development.. We've got the forums done, we have also finally added vBulliten, but our themes are being a bit glitchy.. If you have any donations to get us a new theme, donate away :D >_> Anyways, we've also added a board for our development.
I will not exactly be taking part in the development, seeing how my skills at any programming language is at below minimum.. So you will be working with part of the staff (Monkey Wacko, Hippie, Teh Dew, Aftereffect, blah blah blah).
Anyways, we're not looking for [b]any[/b] forum staff members, or that kind of crap. We'll handpick those who are active, and help out the community/development.
[B]What are our goals?[/B]
We have simple goals..
• To make an official server, which is unlike every other one you see. • To be ahead of everybody, and make our own full 474 client. • To have great forums; where everybody is active. • To show that we are not below everybody else, to show that we too can program. [B]• To be perfect, to be ahead (or atleast close) to Runescape itself, and to show everybody that small programmers can do big things[/B]
[B]A few FAQ[/B]
Question - Are there any requirements? Answer - Of course there is, we are not expecting any normal moron who knows how to add a method, we're looking for people who know what OOP is, and people who are not total morons, and can really program.
Question - Can I be an Administrator on the forums, or server? Answer - If you are able to be active, and truely earn it.. You may be able to.
Question - Can I be a beta tester or hoster? Answer - Wait until we've made it to the beta stage, once we've reached that we will be looking for Beta Testers, and hosters. If not, our staff will test the server.
Question - I know no java, but can I still join the forums and be part of the development team? Answer - Of course, you can help with the forums, and teaching people what they've done wrong, and you may not be part of the development team, but you'll be very helpful; therefore the staff will respect you, and you may earn a high position on the server.
Question - I don't speak English, is it still possible for me to help the server? Answer - I'm sorry, but no. We're looking for people with high English skills, because we don't want a server where it sends a message saying "o fo zizzle yo fo doozle", we want it to be proper English. If you have any other questions - Post here.
Here are the filled positions, and the amount of members needed.
[B]Forum Administrators[/B] - DO NOT APPLY FOR THESE: Aff Nour
[B]Forum Global Moderators[/B] - DO NOT APPLY FOR THESE: Mod Thirosa
[B]Server Programmers[/B] Aftereffect Goddess Hippyss/Nour [U]Spot Available[/U] [U]Spot Available[/U] [U]Spot Available[/U]
[B]Client Programmers[/B] Dog eats Dog [U]Spot Available[/U] [U]Spot Available[/U] [U]Spot Available[/U] [U]Spot Available[/U]
If you would like to apply, contact me on MSN, or find a way to contact us on our forums. If you PM me on these forums.. You're automatically declined. Posting here MAY work, but you would have to be able to supply a fair amount of evidence on your programming abilities.

item.title: RuneImpact - Looking for Client&&Server Programmers
item.dc:creator: @morterdestroyer morterdestroyer
item.description:
@morterdestroyer wrote:

[quote=“Aff, post:1, topic:157658”][center][b]Read the all of the god damn post before you reply.[/center]

Yeah, I know I’m not too good with Java… Infact I totally blow at it. But me, and my friends are making a development… We’ve got the forums done, we have also finally added vBulliten, but our themes are being a bit glitchy… If you have any donations to get us a new theme, donate away >_> Anyways, we’ve also added a board for our development.

I will not exactly be taking part in the development, seeing how my skills at any programming language is at below minimum… So you will be working with part of the staff (Monkey Wacko, Hippie, Teh Dew, Aftereffect, blah blah blah).

Anyways, we’re not looking for any forum staff members, or that kind of crap. We’ll handpick those who are active, and help out the community/development.

What are our goals?

We have simple goals…

• To make an official server, which is unlike every other one you see.
• To be ahead of everybody, and make our own full 474 client.
• To have great forums; where everybody is active.
• To show that we are not below everybody else, to show that we too can program.
• To be perfect, to be ahead (or atleast close) to Runescape itself, and to show everybody that small programmers can do big things

A few FAQ

Question - Are there any requirements?
Answer - Of course there is, we are not expecting any normal moron who knows how to add a method, we’re looking for people who know what OOP is, and people who are not total morons, and can really program.

Question - Can I be an Administrator on the forums, or server?
Answer - If you are able to be active, and truely earn it… You may be able to.

Question - Can I be a beta tester or hoster?
Answer - Wait until we’ve made it to the beta stage, once we’ve reached that we will be looking for Beta Testers, and hosters. If not, our staff will test the server.

Question - I know no java, but can I still join the forums and be part of the development team?
Answer - Of course, you can help with the forums, and teaching people what they’ve done wrong, and you may not be part of the development team, but you’ll be very helpful; therefore the staff will respect you, and you may earn a high position on the server.

Question - I don’t speak English, is it still possible for me to help the server?
Answer - I’m sorry, but no. We’re looking for people with high English skills, because we don’t want a server where it sends a message saying “o fo zizzle yo fo doozle”, we want it to be proper English.
If you have any other questions - Post here.

Here are the filled positions, and the amount of members needed.

Forum Administrators - DO NOT APPLY FOR THESE:

Nour

Forum Global Moderators - DO NOT APPLY FOR THESE:

If you would like to apply, contact me on MSN, or find a way to contact us on our forums. If you PM me on these forums… You’re automatically declined. Posting here MAY work, but you would have to be able to supply a fair amount of evidence on your programming abilities.[/quote]
